TopicTitle: spacecraft don't show up on Tracking station/Map

Articles.Content: I launched a probe into orbit and then ended the flight.it was in perfect orbit when I left it. I went to my map but couldn't find my probe.it does show the debris though. Is it a bug? am I doing something wrong?Any help would be appreciated. Thank you in advance .
It sounds like you're looking at debris in the tracking station. Try switching the view to probes (in the upper left part of the UI). Does that help?

Well when you say you 'ended the flight' do you mean that or not? you see when the game was in 0.20 (just over a week ago) when you press 'esc' there was an 'end flight option'. this button get your craft and well...deletes it.

If your in 0.21 then you cant end the flight with the end flight button. and i will assume you went back to the space centre. if this is the case then like what 'Totema' said, when your in the tracking station make sure you are not just looking at the debris. to look at other categories simply go to the top left had corner and click the different tabs.

Hope this helps

Rob
Got it. Thanks for the help guys.
